alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, eastern Hamilton, southeastern Coffee, Pierce, Echols, southwestern Brantley, Clinch, northwestern Charlton, eastern Atkinson, Ware, Bacon, southwestern Jeff Davis and central Appling Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms centered 10 miles south of Argyle, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Douglas, Jasper, Alma, Blackshear, Homerville, Pearson, Fargo, Argyle and Statenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
